parameters: Muercie is a support character and has such spells as Healing. Cure. and Confusion effects.
She can also drain mana from foes to use for herself
To explain we have put you in a test battle with a dummy combatant
This combatant cannot be defeated and you can practice your skills as long as you like
This system works based on Active Time
Slowly over time. The purple bar in the bottom will fill up
When it is full. you can then execute a command
On the right hand side you have your ATB Timeline
This shows the current timeline of actions for all entities in battle
The left hand side is reserved for enemies. While the right hand side is reserved for you
Be careful. When it is your turn, Time does not stop, And enemies can attack you while inputting any command
Other than that. The rest of the battle UI should be self explanatory.
At the bottom you can see all of your stats such as health, magic and special points.
And on the left. Is where you can execute battle commands
Good job. You can keep testing...
Or escape the battle to exit the training

name: Axe Grunt, Blade Grunt, Hammer Grunt, Mage Grunt, Spear Grunt, Halberd Grunt, Blade Grunt, Katana Grunt

parameters: From here on out. The enemies you'll face get a lot tougher.
Be on your toes and act fast.
Lets put on something more fitting
I have delivered the Murphy Battle Bot to you
I also bundled one of my signature coffee brews too
As well as a one time use healing beam
What do you mean it only healed 1HP?

\>Everything looks fine on my end This code was not supposed to go in to production yet That code seemed so simple I didn't think it needed testing It's just some unlucky coincidence It was working in my head The existing design makes it difficult to do the right thing We outsourced that months ago We should have updated our software years ago Nobody asked me how long it would actually take I couldn't find any examples of how that can be done anywhere else in the project I haven't been able to reproduce that Oh, that was only supposed to be a placeholder I broke that deliberately to do some testing The third party documentation doesn't exist
OKAY RUGO I GET IT ENOUGH OF YOUR DEVELOPER EXCUSES
